name: Litesport XR: Boxing, Strength, & More
summary:
🎉 NEW UPDATE: DAILY DASH (Quest 3 Only)
Turn your workouts into a game! Run, jump, and dodge your way through a new obstacle course every day.

🤸 FUN-FILLED VR FITNESS
Jump into a world of exhilarating fitness where your workouts aren’t just exercises; they're fun! 

🥊VARIETY OF WORKOUT TYPES
Choose from a diverse range of workouts including boxing, strength training, and bootcamp to keep your fitness routine exciting.

🆓 7-DAY FREE TRIAL
Are you ready to give it a try? Start your 7-day trial...
